translation:
My most esteemed colonel and respectable friend

I continue my insistence regarding the primary school teacher of São Gabriel, now your secretary, Your Excellency Your Excellency

Here Your Excellency Most Illustrious Sir Your Excellency

From Your Excellency Friend, the most affectionate and obliged Domingos José de Almeida Piratini, January 19, 1839.
